text:
@BillNeelyNBC @Paulrichardsmig @coronavirus The testing is *seemingly* focused on celebrities and Royalty.

I don't share your optimism that the British people will turn. In the meantime scum traders are selling sanitiser gel and toilet rolls out the back of vans at extortionate prices.
